req.name: Items
items: 3 of any kind of food (7 Shrimp, 7 Cabbage, 7 Onion)

description: Enter the Troll Stronghold. (Skip this section if you already have a goutweed!)
Go down the stairs, south.
Go down the stairs, north-east.
Follow the path while avoiding the trolls to get to the goutweed.
Enter the mine.
Crawl-through the cave entrance.

7.step: Talk to the fallen man and close the interface when it appears. (Chat 1)

description: Talk to the fallen man and close the interface when it appears.

8.step: Use the food on him in this order: Cabbage, Onion, Shrimp, Cabbage.

description: Use the cabbage on the fallen man. Follow the order because he will get sick of getting fed the same food.
Use the onion on the fallen man.
Use the shrimp on the fallen man.
Use the cabbage on the fallen man.
Talk to the fallen man.

10.step: Use the food on him in this order: Onion, Shrimp, Cabbage, Onion.

description: Use the onion on the fallen man.
Use the shrimp on the fallen man.
Use the cabbage on the fallen man.
Use the onion on the fallen man.

11.step: Talk to him and choose positive responses until he sits up.

description: Talk to him and choose positive responses until he sits up. (Random chat options for every person)

12.step: Use the food on him in this order: Shrimp, Cabbage, Onion, Shrimp, Cabbage, Onion.

description: Use the shrimp on the fallen man.
Use the cabbage on the fallen man.
Use the onion on the fallen man. Repeat this twice.

13.step: Talk to him and choose positive responses until he stands up.

description: Talk to him and choose positive responses until he stands up.
Talk to 'Bird's-Eye' Jack.

15.step: Select the equipment determined by the most dominant skill. See below.

description: For combat levels determined by melee skills: Dragon med helm, Abyssal whip, Ahrim's robetop, Ahrim's robeskirt, Ranger boots.
For combat levels determined by tbe ranged skill: Splitbark helm, Karil's leathertop, Torag's platelegs, Adamant boots, Magic shortbow.
For combat levels determined by the magic skill: Robin hood hat, Dragon chainbody, Black d'hide chaps, Infinity boots, Ancient staff

16.step: Use the food on him in this order: Shrimp, Cabbage, Onion, Shrimp, Cabbage, Onion.

description: Use the shrimp on the fallen man.
Use the cabbage on the fallen man.
Use the onion on the fallen man. Repeat this twice.

17.step: Talk to him again multiple times, giving positive responses until you receive a cut-scene.

description: Talk to him again multiple times, giving positive responses until you receive a cut-scene.

18.subtitle: Dream potion
18.step: Talk to the Oneiromancer for a dream vial. (Chat 2)

description: Talk to the Oneiromancer for a dream vial.

19.step: Fill the vial with water, then add a goutweed.

description: Fill the vial with water, then add a goutweed.

20.step: Use hammer on an Astral rune, then use the shards on the pestle and mortar.

21.step: Add the ground astral runes to the dream vial.

description: Light the Ceremonial Brazier. Bring good food, armour, weapon, dream potion, tinderbox, and seal of passage (Teleports/Prayer won't work!).
Talk to Cyrisus.
Kill The Inadequacy (level 343).
Kill The Everlasting (level 223).
Kill The Untouchable (level 274).
Kill The Illusive (level 108).
Talk to Oneiromancer.
